waarom-direct-sales-carriere.title: 5 Reasons Why Direct Sales Can Launch Your Career
waarom-direct-sales-carriere.excerpt: Discover why more and more young professionals are choosing a career in direct sales. From flexibility to unlimited earning potential - these are the benefits you need to know.
content: Are you looking for a career with unlimited possibilities? Direct sales offers exactly that. At RTT Commerce, we see young professionals grow into successful entrepreneurs every day. Here are the five reasons why direct sales could be your perfect starting point.
## 1. Flexibility and Freedom

Unlike a traditional 9-to-5 job, direct sales offers the freedom to set your own schedule. You are your own boss and decide how many hours you work. This flexibility makes it possible to perfectly balance work and personal life.
## 2. Unlimited Earning Potential

At RTT Commerce, your income is not limited by a fixed salary. The more you put in, the more you earn. Our top performers prove every month that hard work and smart strategies lead to an income well above average.
## 3. Personal Development

Sales is the ultimate school for personal growth. You learn to communicate, negotiate, deal with rejection, and persevere. These skills are valuable in every aspect of your life, not just your career.
## 4. Entrepreneurial Experience

As a Brand Ambassador at RTT Commerce, you learn the basic principles of entrepreneurship. From customer acquisition to relationship management - you build a complete skill set that you can use to start your own business later.
## 5. A Close-Knit Team and Network

At RTT Commerce, you become part of a dynamic team. Our regular events, trainings, and team-building activities create a strong network that will support your career for years to come. Your colleagues become your friends and mentors.
## Ready to Get Started?

Whether you just graduated or are looking for a career change, direct sales offers the opportunities you're looking for. At RTT Commerce, you get all the support and training you need to succeed. Contact us today and discover what we can do for you.

groeipad-rtt-commerce.title: From Starter to Team Leader: Your Growth Path at RTT Commerce
groeipad-rtt-commerce.excerpt: Curious about growth opportunities in sales? Discover how our Brand Ambassadors grow into successful Team Leaders with guidance and training.
content: At RTT Commerce, we believe in developing talent. Since our founding in 2017, we have seen dozens of young professionals grow from entry-level positions to leadership roles. This is what your growth path could look like.
## Step 1: Brand Ambassador

As a Brand Ambassador, you learn the fundamentals of sales and customer relationships. You work directly with customers, develop your communication skills, and get to know the products and services inside and out. This phase typically lasts 3-6 months.
## Step 2: Senior Brand Ambassador
After proving your skills and achieving consistent results, you become a Senior Brand Ambassador. You get more responsibility, mentor new team members, and develop your leadership qualities.
## Step 3: Team Coordinator

As a Team Coordinator, you lead a small team of Brand Ambassadors. You are responsible for their development, motivation, and results. This is where you really learn what it means to lead a team to success.
## Step 4: Team Leader
The ultimate step in our organization. As a Team Leader, you are responsible for a larger team, strategy, and business development. You have a direct impact on the growth of RTT Commerce.
## Our Training and Support

Every step is supported by extensive training. From weekly coaching sessions to monthly conferences abroad - we invest in your development. Our successful team members like Lou, Quentin, and Yaren prove that this approach works.
## Your Journey Starts Here
Whether you're just starting out or already have experience, there's always room to grow at RTT Commerce. We don't look at your CV, but at your potential and drive. Are you ready for the challenge?

klantrelaties-bouwen.title: How to Build Customer Relationships That Last
klantrelaties-bouwen.excerpt: Lasting customer relationships are the key to long-term success in sales. Learn the techniques our top performers use to retain customers.
content: In sales, it's all about relationships. A satisfied customer comes back and refers others. But how do you build relationships that truly last? These are the techniques our top performers use.
## Listen More Than You Talk
The best salespeople are excellent listeners. Before presenting a solution, you must first truly understand your customer's situation. Ask open questions and actively listen to the answers.
## Be Authentic
Customers can tell when you're not genuine. Be yourself, give honest advice - even if it means missing a deal in the short term. This builds the trust that leads to long-term relationships.
## Deliver More Than You Promise
Under-promise and over-deliver is a classic but effective strategy. Surprise your customers with extra value, faster service, or unexpected attention. These small extras make the difference.
## Stay in Touch

Relationships wither without maintenance. Contact your customers regularly - not just when you want to sell something. A check-in to ask how things are going shows you care about them as a person, not just as a source of income.
## Solve Problems Quickly
Problems inevitably arise. How you handle them defines your relationship. Respond quickly, take responsibility, and focus on solutions. A well-solved problem can even strengthen the relationship.
## Ask for Feedback
Actively ask for feedback from your customers. This shows you value their opinion and gives you valuable insights to improve your service. Plus, customers who give feedback feel more engaged.

sales-tips-young-professionals-2024.title: Sales Tips for Young Professionals in 2024
sales-tips-young-professionals-2024.excerpt: The sales world is evolving fast. From social selling to personal branding - these are the modern techniques every young professional needs to master.
content: The sales world of 2024 looks different than it did ten years ago. Social media, AI, and changing customer expectations have completely transformed the playing field. These are the tips every modern sales professional needs to know.
## Embrace Social Selling

LinkedIn, Instagram, and even TikTok are powerful tools for sales. Build your personal brand, share valuable content, and connect with potential customers on platforms where they are active. At RTT Commerce, we see every day how social media generates leads.
## Invest in Personal Branding

In 2024, people buy from people, not companies. Work on your personal brand. What makes you unique? Why would a customer want to work with you? A strong personal brand opens doors that would otherwise remain closed.
## Master Video Communication
Video calls have become standard. Make sure your setup is professional - good lighting, quiet background, stable internet connection. Practice your camera presence until it feels natural.
## Work Data-Driven
Modern sales is all about data. Use CRM systems, analyze your results, and adjust your approach based on what the numbers tell you. Intuition is valuable, but data makes you objectively better.
## Develop Emotional Intelligence

In a world full of automation, human connection becomes more important than ever. Work on your EQ - the ability to recognize, understand, and influence emotions. This is what distinguishes top sellers from average performers.
## Keep Learning

The sales world doesn't stand still and neither should you. Read books, follow podcasts, attend trainings. At RTT Commerce, we offer continuous education to our teams because we know that standing still means falling behind.
## Build Resilience
Rejection is part of sales. The best salespeople don't get discouraged by a 'no'. They learn from it and move on. Work on your mental resilience - it's perhaps the most important skill of all.

werken-als-brand-ambassador.title: Working as a Brand Ambassador: What Can You Expect?
werken-als-brand-ambassador.excerpt: A look behind the scenes at RTT Commerce. Discover what a day as a Brand Ambassador involves, from team events to personal growth.
content: Are you considering a career as a Brand Ambassador at RTT Commerce? Then you're probably curious about what a typical workday involves and what you can expect. Here we give you an honest look behind the scenes.
## A Typical Day

No day is the same as a Brand Ambassador. You usually start with a team meeting where goals are discussed and successes celebrated. Then you go into the field to meet customers and build relationships. The afternoon flies by with customer conversations and follow-ups.
## Training and Development

From day one, you are supported by experienced mentors. Weekly trainings help you improve your skills, from communication techniques to negotiation strategies. You learn not only to sell, but also to be an entrepreneur.
## Team Culture

At RTT Commerce, we are more than colleagues - we are a team. Regular team events, from rooftop networking in Brussels to international conferences, create a close bond. Successes are celebrated together.
## Flexibility
As a Brand Ambassador, you have the freedom to develop your own approach. Of course, there are goals to achieve, but how you do it is up to you. This autonomy makes the work varied and challenging.
## Challenges

Let's be honest - sales is not always easy. You will hear 'no', lose deals, and experience setbacks. But with the right mindset and support from your team, these challenges become opportunities for growth.
## The Rewards

In addition to a competitive income, working as a Brand Ambassador offers intangible rewards: personal growth, a strong network, and the satisfaction of building your own success. Our people choose this career and stay because it changes lives.
## Is It for You?

If you're ambitious, enjoy working with people, and aren't afraid of challenges, this role is probably right for you. We're not looking for perfect CVs, but for driven people with potential. Maybe you're our next successful Brand Ambassador?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: At RTT Commerce, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data.
privacy.introduction: RTT Commerce BV ("we", "our" or "RTT Commerce") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users, applicants and business partners. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable Belgian legislation.

dataCollection.title: Data we collect
content: We collect different types of personal data depending on your interaction with our services. When you apply, we collect your identification information (first name, last name), contact details (email, phone), CV and application documents, as well as your language preferences.
When browsing our website, we may collect technical data such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited and duration of visits. This information helps us improve the user experience.
If you contact us, we retain the content of your messages as well as any information you choose to share with us.

dataUsage.title: How we use your data
content: Your personal data is used to process and manage job applications, communicate with you about professional opportunities, improve our services and website, and comply with our legal obligations.
We also use your data to send you information about our events and career opportunities, only if you have given your consent. You can unsubscribe at any time.
We never sell your personal data to third parties. Your information remains strictly confidential and is only shared with team members involved in the recruitment process.

dataSecurity.title: Data security
content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against loss, unauthorized access, modification or disclosure.
Our systems are regularly updated and our employees are trained in best practices for data protection. Access to your data is strictly limited to those who need it to perform their duties.
In the event of a data breach likely to present a risk to your rights and freedoms, we will inform you and the competent data protection authority within the time limits prescribed by law.

cookies.title: Cookies and similar technologies
content: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Essential cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.
Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors use our website, allowing us to continuously improve our services. Marketing cookies are used to offer you personalized content.
You can manage your cookie preferences at any time via our consent banner or your browser settings. For more information, please see our detailed cookie policy.

retention.title: Data retention
content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy or to comply with our legal obligations.
Application data is retained for a maximum period of 2 years after the last contact, unless you ask us to delete it earlier or you give us your consent for longer retention.
Browsing and analytics data is generally retained for a maximum of 13 months in accordance with CNIL recommendations.

rights.title: Your rights
content: Under the GDPR, you have extensive rights over your personal data. You have the right to access your data, rectify it if it is inaccurate, and request its deletion in certain circumstances.
You can also request the restriction of processing of your data, object to certain processing, and request the portability of your data to another controller.

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@rtt-commerce.com. We will respond to your request within one month. If you believe your rights are not being respected, you can file a complaint with the Belgian Data Protection Authority.

contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or the processing of your personal data, please do not hesitate to contact us.
